healthConditionsDietRecommendations.description: Chronic condition affecting blood sugar regulation.

nutrientAdjustments.recommendation: Focus on complex carbs with low glycemic index; limit refined sugars
Increase intake from whole grains, beans, vegetables

recommendedMeals: Red Red (moderate portion, served with boiled plantain)
healthConditionsDietRecommendations.source: WHO and Ghana Health Service diabetes dietary guidelines

healthConditionsDietRecommendations.description: High blood pressure condition increasing risk of heart disease and stroke.
recommendedMeals: Light Soup with fish and vegetables
Fruit-based snacks instead of fried foods
healthConditionsDietRecommendations.source: WHO hypertension dietary guidelines adapted for Ghana

healthConditionsDietRecommendations.description: Condition marked by low iron levels, reducing oxygen transport in the blood.

nutrientAdjustments.recommendation: Increase intake of heme iron from meat and fish; combine plant-based iron sources with vitamin C
Increase to improve non-heme iron absorption

recommendedMeals: Waakye with beef or fish and vegetable stew
Red Red with boiled plantain and fresh pepper sauce
Fufu with light soup containing goat meat
avoidMeals: Tea or coffee with meals (reduces iron absorption)
Highly processed refined bread without fortification
healthConditionsDietRecommendations.source: Ghana Health Service anemia management protocol

healthConditionsDietRecommendations.description: Excess body fat accumulation posing health risks.

nutrientAdjustments.recommendation: Reduce daily calorie intake by 500-750 kcal for gradual weight loss
Limit saturated fat; focus on healthy fats

avoidMeals: Palm Nut Soup with excess oil

healthConditionsDietRecommendations.description: Gradual loss of kidney function over time.

nutrientAdjustments.recommendation: Moderate protein intake, focusing on high-quality sources
Limit if blood potassium levels are high

recommendedMeals: Plain cooked rice with vegetable stew
Boiled plantain with garden egg stew
avoidMeals: Palm Nut Soup (high in potassium if taken with certain vegetables)
healthConditionsDietRecommendations.source: Ghana Health Service CKD nutrition recommendations
